importCSV.expectedFormatDescription: The uploaded CSV file must be comma-separated. The first line is expected to be a header with the values: Task, Date, Hours.
importCSV.dateDescription: The date in either YYYY-MM-DD format or full UTC ISO timestamp (e.g., YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ).
importCSV.title: Import CSV Data
importCSV.removeFile.title: Remove File

importCSV.errorsInvalidHeader: Invalid CSV header format. Expected: Task, Date, Hours

settings.enable_anonymous_logins: Allow anonymous user creation (activates the /try route)?
settings.show_custom_fields_in_details: Show/export custom fields in details view?

settings.enable_log_for_other_users: Can administrator register time for other users?
settings.project_search_num_results: Number of projects displayed in the project search (default 5)
settings.task_search_num_results: Number of tasks displayed in the task search (default 5)
settings.user_search_num_results: Number of users displayed in the user search (default 5)
settings.rounding_tooltip: Tracked time will be rounded up according to the selected time unit and the specified rounding value e.g. time unit minutes and round value 15 will round up to the next 15 minutes (input 5 minutes > result after rounding 15 minutes).
settings.show_resource_in_details: Show/export resource field in details view?
settings.show_rate_in_details: Show/export rate field in details view?
settings.enable_task_planning: Enable task planning with estimated hours?
settings.user_action_verification_url_param: User action verification URL parameter name

verification.overdue_message: You have missed the deadline to complete the required action. Please complete it immediately.

verification.account_locked_message: Your account has been locked because the required action verification was not completed within the specified timeframe. You must complete the verification to continue using the application.
verification.must_verify_message: To unlock your account and continue using Titra, please complete the required verification action.

login.email_unknown: Sorry, but we could not find an account with the provided e-mail adress.

administration.globalsettings_help: Need help setting the correct values? Checkout the titra
administration.extensionHint: Attention: most extensions will need a restart of the titra service to work properly.
administration.possible_values_hint: Separate values with a comma (e.g. a,b,c,d).
administration.category_hint: The category is used to group custom fields visually.
administration.no_customfields: No custom fields have been defined yet.
administration.no_extensions: No extensions have been installed yet.
administration.extension_removed: The extension has been removed successfully.
administration.oidc_configure: You'll need to create an OpenID Connect client configuration with your provider. Set App Callbacks URLs to
administration.custom_field_name_hint: Spaces and special characters are not allowed.
administration.inbound_processdata_hint: This JavaScript will be executed whenever inbound interface data is requested. The script must return a JSON object (or a promise returning such an object) with the following structure: [{name: 'name', description:'description'}].
administration.outbound_processdata_hint: This JavaScript will be executed on the server whenever the corresponding button is clicked by a user in the details page. The script will receive the currently displayed data in the 'data' variable and has access to the node fetch function to send data to an external system. There is no need to return a value, all errors will be caught and displayed to the user as '500 internal server error'.
administration.create_edit_webhook_verification: Create or edit webhook verification interface
administration.allowed_domains_hint: Comma-separated list of domains allowed to send webhooks (e.g. api.stripe.com, webhook.example.com)
administration.webhook_processdata_hint: This JavaScript will be executed whenever a webhook is received. The script has access to 'webhookData' (the webhook payload) and 'senderDomain' variables. Return an object with 'action' ('complete' or 'revoke') and 'userId' properties to process verification, or null to ignore the webhook.
administration.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
